name: UIConfigurationTextAttributesTransformer
desc: Defines a text transformation that can affect the visual appearance of a string.

items.name: init((AttributeContainer) -> AttributeContainer)
items.desc: Creates a new text attributes transformer.

items.name: let transform: (AttributeContainer) -> AttributeContainer
items.desc: A closure that defines the text transformation.

items.name: func callAsFunction(AttributeContainer) -> AttributeContainer
items.desc: Calls the transform closure of the text attributes transformer.
